question: You are currently trying to improve your knowledge of a language which is not your first language. You have a friend who speaks this language fluently. You have decided to write to this friend Write a letter to your friend.In your letter, Explain why you want to improve your knowledge of this language ask him/her for suggestions on how to learn more quickly. propose that you meet your friend to talk about it. Write at least 150 words.
text: Hope you and your family all are well. I’m happy to convey that as you advised during the last visit, decided to join the spoken English course. Whenever you come here you always suggested learning an additional language especially English. As you said earlier, English is a worldwide language and if we learn then we can get more opportunities. I’m really thinking of it and finally decided to learn. I know very well when you see this letter you feel very excited.
I need your support and suggestions to learn quickly. You are well educated and you already had  experience in learning this language. You also have  practical exposure to using this language.
I’m eagerly waiting to see you soon. I have an idea to come to my uncle's home which is nearby your office. If you are free, then we can meet and spend some time together.
